name: Pegah World (Secret Santa Game)
description:
Explore Pegah World, and rescue their two frogs Zeniba and Yubaba!
This game was made for a secret santa gift exchange for my friend Pegah based on their art. If you liked the game check out the art this game was based on here!

Song by Ostin as usual!

This was made in Multicolor Bitsy + which is like Bitsy but with more colors and some other features, which helped me make this quickly and rainbowily.
